languages.text: Старец, к удивлению Лорд-капитана, оказался навигатором. Узнав о высоком статусе {mf|гостя|гостьи}, он поведал свою историю. Он удалился на эту планету давным-давно, будучи еще юношей — в миг, когда осознал, что не выдержит частых погружений в ужасное царство Архиврага. С гордостью он говорил, что долгие годы посвящал каждый миг жизни молитвам Императору. Однако голос его при воспоминаниях о золотом свете Астрономикона дрожал, и вслед гостям старец смотрел со странной тоской.

To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.
languages.original_text: Старец, к удивлению Лорд-капитана, оказался навигатором. Узнав о высоком статусе {mf|гостя|гостьи}, он поведал свою историю. Он удалился на эту планету давным-давно, будучи еще юношей — в миг, когда осознал, что не выдержит частых погружений в ужасное царство Архиврага. traits.locale_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the hermit turned out to be a former Navigator who was willing to entrust his life story to the noble guest. Since his early days the Navigator realised his mind was too weak to withstand the dangers of the Immaterium and the Archenemy, and left while he still was but a youth. He spoke with pride about worshipping the Emperor each and every day. Yet, when he mentioned the Astronomican, his voice quivered, and when his quests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze full with sadness.

The hermit spoke with pride about worshiping the Emperor each and every moment of his life. Yet, when mentioning the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

languages.text: 令领主舰长惊讶的是，这位年迈的隐士居然是一位导航者。当老人意识到访客的尊贵身份之后，便将自己过去的经历实言相告。很久以前，他还是个年轻人的时候，就在这颗行星上过起了隐居的生活，因为他意识到，他的思想无法承受频繁进入亚空间带来的精神压力，无法禁受混沌大敌所在的领域。老隐士自豪地说道，他生命中的每一刻都在崇拜帝皇。然而，当他谈及星炬的金色光芒时，他的声音却颤抖了起来。当他的访客离开时，他盯着客人们离去的背影看了很久，目光中充满了悲伤。
languages.original_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

languages.text: Para sorpresa de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, el viejo ermitaño resulta ser un Navegante. Al descubrir la nobleza de su visitante, el anciano no duda en compartir su historia. Se retiró a este planeta hace mucho, cuando aún era joven, tras comprender que su mente no aguantaría los viajes repetidos al Inmaterio, el reino del Archienemigo. El ermitaño relató con orgullo cómo había dedicado cada momento de su vida a adorar al Emperador, pero, cuando mencionó la luz dorada del Astronomicón, se le quebró la voz. Cuando sus invitados se marchan, se pasa un largo rato observándoles con una mirada llena de tristeza.
languages.original_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

Cuando sus invitados se marchan, se pasa un largo rato observándoles con una mirada llena de tristeza.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは驚いたが、その年老いた世捨て人は航宙士（ナヴィゲイター）であることが判明した。そして、老人は訪問者が高貴な身分であることがわかると、進んで自分の物語を語った。昔、まだ若かった頃だ。渾沌の勢力の領域である非物質世界への度重なる略奪行為に耐えられなくなり、この星に引きこもったのだと。世捨て人は、自分がいかに皇帝を崇拝してきたかを誇らしげに語った。しかし、星辰波（アストロノミカン）の黄金の光の話に触れると、その声は震えていた。客人が帰ると、世捨て人は長い間客人の後ろ姿を見つめていた。そのまなざしは、悲しみに満ちていた。
languages.original_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

languages.text: Zur Überraschung des Lord Captains stellt sich heraus, dass der alte Einsiedler früher einmal Navigator war. Und als der Alte feststellt, dass {mf|sein Besucher|seine Besucherin} dem Hochadel angehört, berichtet er bereitwillig aus seinem Leben. Er hatte sich vor langer Zeit auf diesen Planeten zurückgekehrt, noch zu Jugendzeiten. Er hatte nämlich erkannt, dass sein Verstand es nicht ertragen würde, regelmäßig in das Immaterium zu reisen, das Reich des Erzfeinds. Der Einsiedler sprach stolz darüber, wie er den Imperator jeden Augenblick seines Lebens verehrt hatte. Als er aber vom goldenen Licht des Astronomican sprach, zitterte seine Stimme. Als seine Gäste ihn verließen, starrte er ihnen mit traurigen Augen lange nach.
languages.original_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.

Er hatte sich vor langer Zeit auf diesen Planeten zurückgekehrt, noch zu Jugendzeiten. Als seine Gäste ihn verließen, starrte er ihnen mit traurigen Augen lange nach.

languages.text: À la grande surprise {mf|du|de la} seigneur-capitaine, le vieil ermite était en fait un navigateur. Et lorsque le vieil homme apprit le noble statut de {mf|son visiteur|sa visiteuse}, il accepta de raconter son histoire. Il s'était retiré sur cette planète il y a bien longtemps, alors qu'il était encore jeune, après s'être rendu compte que son esprit ne pourrait pas supporter de fréquentes excursions dans l'Immaterium, le royaume du Grand Ennemi. L'ermite parlait avec fierté de la manière dont il avait vénéré l'Empereur à chaque moment de sa vie. Mais lorsqu'il évoqua la lumière dorée de l'Astronomican, sa voix tressaillit. Lorsque ses invités prirent congé, il les regarda s'éloigner pendant un long moment, le regard empli de tristesse.
languages.original_text: To the Lord Captain's surprise, the old hermit turned out to be a Navigator. And when the old man discovered the noble status of his visitor, he willingly recounted his tale. He had retreated to this planet long ago, back when he was still in his youth, after he had realised that his mind would not withstand frequent forays into the Immaterium, the realm of the Archenemy. The hermit spoke with pride about how he had worshipped the Emperor each and every moment of his life. But when he mentioned the golden light of the Astronomican, his voice quivered. When his guests left, he stared after them for a long time, his gaze filled with sadness.
